assets.description: We cut the show opening promo.
assets.title: TI & Tiny Show

assets.description: Over the course of a year, we worked closely with Dave Attell, doing everything but filming this grainy, cheesy smut of yesteryear, editing, designing, animating and handling audio for each 30-minute episode. Much of the work came in rendering, as the entire series is shot against a green screen, with the film later added to the footage of Dave and his posse on the couch.
assets.title: Dave's Old Porn

assets.description: Titles were created in Photoshop and composited in Flame to create this documentary open.
assets.title: It Might Get Loud

assets.description: Titles were created in Photoshop and composited in Flame to create this documentary open.
assets.title: Rachel's Getting Married

assets.description: Titles were created in Photoshop and composited in Flame to create this documentary open.
assets.title: Man from Plains

assets.description: Using provided live action footage and various sparks in Flame, we created this promo.
assets.title: Nurse Jackie

assets.description:
To convince Comedy Central to bring this show from pilot to series, the Click 3X team not only edited the pilot, but created both the show's graphics package, as well as segment specific animations.
For the graphics package our team worked in Maya, C4D, AE, and Flame.   Maya and C4D were used as design/modeling/3d animating tools, with AE being a finishing tool, and Flame used for Roto, CC, and screen replacement. This package included the show open, bumps, transitions, and segment specific titles.
assets.title: Onion Sports

assets.description: We created CG generated elements and environments in Maya and composited in Flame to create these visual effects for "AfterLife" the Movie.
assets.title: Afterlife
